docs.snippet: With the formal dispatch of official invitations to fifty-three countries, Germany has commenced preparations for the 1936 Olympic Games at Berlin and is ready' "to welcome the youth of the world with Olympic hospitality.
docs.lead_paragraph: With the formal dispatch of official invitations to fifty-three countries, Germany has commenced preparations for the 1936 Olympic Games at Berlin and is ready' "to welcome the youth of the world with Olympic hospitality.

headline.main: OLYMPIC BIDS GO TO 53 COUNTRIES; No Discrimination Shown in Issuing Invitations to 1936 Games at Berlin. IMPOSING PLANT PLANNED 285-Acre Park to Be Setting for Centralized Layout, Built With Eye to Future.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Jan. 6. -- War will be resumed in the Chaco at midnight tonight. Whatever slight hope remained last night that the truce between Bolivia and Paraguay might be prolonged disappeared with the receipt of dispatches from Asuncion this...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Jan. 6. -- War will be resumed in the Chaco at midnight tonight. Whatever slight hope remained last night that the truce between Bolivia and Paraguay might be prolonged disappeared with the receipt of dispatches from Asuncion this morning saying that under no circumstances would the armistice be extended.

headline.main: WAR RESUMED IN CHACO AS MEDIATION BY LEAGUE FAILS TO PROLONG TRUCE; ASUNCION ENDS ARMISTICE

docs.snippet: Improvement was registered in the dollar last week. Opening at a loss of 1/4 cent, at 62.78 cents, on Tuesday, the rate moved up steadily to 64.07, on Friday. There was a moderate reaction at the week-end to 63.62 cents, but this was still more than...
docs.lead_paragraph: Improvement was registered in the dollar last week. Opening at a loss of 1/4 cent, at 62.78 cents, on Tuesday, the rate moved up steadily to 64.07, on Friday. There was a moderate reaction at the week-end to 63.62 cents, but this was still more than 9-16 cent gain over the preceding week. Range a year ago was 100.43@99.93 cents.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED JAN. 6, 1934.

docs.snippet: The Corn Exchange Bank Trust Company, pursuing the policy which it began a year ago, yesterday published a complete list of its investments as of Jan. 1. The Corn Exchange continues to be unique in giving complete publicity to its portfolio, although...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Corn Exchange Bank Trust Company, pursuing the policy which it began a year ago, yesterday published a complete list of its investments as of Jan. 1. The Corn Exchange continues to be unique in giving complete publicity to its portfolio, although other banks have given an increasing amount of information to shareholders and the public in the last year.

headline.main: HOLDINGS REVISED BY CORN EXCHANGE; Bank Reports Preferred and Common Stocks Virtually Eliminated in 1933.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Jan. 10. -- Foreign Minister Alberto Mane has asked Colombia to recall her new Minister to Uruguay, Jose Camacho Carreno, saying he is no longer persona grata. Senor Camacho Carreno today addressed a note to Dr. Mane, requesting him to...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Jan. 10. -- Foreign Minister Alberto Mane has asked Colombia to recall her new Minister to Uruguay, Jose Camacho Carreno, saying he is no longer persona grata. Senor Camacho Carreno today addressed a note to Dr. Mane, requesting him to state in writing the reasons which make him no longer acceptable as Minister.
docs.abstract: Uruguay asks Colombia to recall him as Min

headline.main: RECALL OF ENVOY ASKED.; Uruguay Notifies Colombia New Minister Is Persona Non Grata.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 11. -- President and Mrs. Roosevelt entertained tonight in honor of the diplomatic corps, giving for them the state dinner included annually in the White House social program, with a musicale afterward to which additional guests were...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 11. -- President and Mrs. Roosevelt entertained tonight in honor of the diplomatic corps, giving for them the state dinner included annually in the White House social program, with a musicale afterward to which additional guests were invited.

headline.main: ROOSEVELTS GIVE DIPLOMATIC DINNER; White House Is the Scene of Annual State Function for 50 Foreign Envoys. TROYANOVSKY IS PRESENT First Formal Entertainment for Soviet Ambassador -- More Guests Attend Musicale.
